item.title: Empirical Economics: Intuitive Does Not Equal Obvious
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: People often claim that conclusions in empirical economics are always obvious, and therefore meaningless. This article aims to refute that view.

item.title: The path to a turnabout lies within
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney Trilogy—a game review.

item.title: Research Note 3: Mountains and Red Roses
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: Investigate Mentougou Jiangou Village. Surrounded by mountains, there are mountains, temples, red roses and hiking marathon enthusiasts.

item.title: Research Note 2: Miyun Wild Great Wall
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: On the way to research, I went with my classmates to climb the Great Wall at Wohu Mountain in Miyun District.

item.title: Self-questioning: Econ-Learning mentality within the hierarchy of disdain
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: Reflecting on the attitude towards the study of economics—what constitutes enthusiasm? What embodies a love for the discipline? Documenting my own hierarchy of disdain in the realm of economic learning.

item.title: [anaconda error]anaconda bytes object has no attribute get
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: [anaconda error]anaconda bytes object has no attribute get

item.title: watching in 2024 : Various Approaches to Coexisting with Fate
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: GPT: This passage explores various perspectives on fate through the analysis of different works, including “Blossoms Shanghai,” “The Long Season,” “Only the River Flows,” and “Journey to the West (sff).” It delves into how individuals reconcile with fate, highlighting themes of acceptance, madness, and awakening. Ultimately, it suggests that coexisting with fate entails maintaining a positive attitude towards survival and finding compromise or acceptance of the inevitable.

item.title: The Custom Font in Hugo
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: The method to customize fonts in each Hugo theme varies, and there are few resources online explaining how to modify fonts in Hugo. Here, we will introduce how to change fonts in the LoveIt theme.

item.title: Causal Effec
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: This paper is a learning note on the recognition effect of causal inference methods, introducing the relationship between ATE, ATT, RCT, ITT, LATE

item.title: Aggregated subscriptions: free movies, comics
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: Introducing software for aggregating subscriptions, which consolidates and manages various website resources for movies, TV shows, and comics.
